attributes.action: alter the e-petition site to allow people to register their opposition as well as their support for any petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst I would support many of the petitions on this site there should be a mechanism for registering your opposition.  This would more accurately reflect the popular will on an issue.

rejection.details: We have added this to our feedback and will give this very serious consideration as we look to see how the beta test phase has worked. Many thanks for your feedback.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
